DOC.brief_summary: Phase I/II study ipilimumab concurrent ipilimumab dabrafenib first line treatment Stage III IV melanoma . Assessing safety Ipilimumab dabrafenib combination . Also , assess disease control rate .
DOC.brief_title: Ipilimumab Dabrafenib 1st Line Tx Unresectable Stage III/IV Melanoma
